subheader: Creating accessible‚ usable and responsive websites with the latest technologies.
tripleParagraph1: Continually evolving as a developer is staying up to date with technologies. Whether picking up new HTML5 or CSS3 features or learning a new JavaScript library‚ it is paramount to stay on the tip of the spear.
